responses.rationale: The segment describes actions being taken but contains no bare negation or explicit calming cue.
The segment describes market impact but contains no bare negation or explicit calming cue.
The segment provides statistics but contains no bare negation or explicit calming cue.
The segment contains a confidence cue ('confident in our producers preparedness') which is handled by Q5.
The segment describes actions being taken but contains no bare negation or explicit calming cue.
The segment describes actions being taken ('working with state and federal authorities to keep the disease out') which implies prevention/preparedness (Q5).
The segment describes a biosecurity plan ('USDA has developed a 14-point biosecurity plan') which implies preparedness (Q5).
The segment describes a requirement for a biosecurity protocol ('must have a biosecurity protocol') which implies preparedness (Q5).
The segment describes actions to kill/confirm absence of the virus ('Disinfection is done to kill the virus', 'testing is used to confirm it’s free') which implies control/eradication (Q5).
The segment describes testing but contains no bare negation or explicit calming cue.
The segment describes control measures ('immediate quarantine', 'eradication of the virus by killing and removing birds') which implies control/eradication (Q5).
The segment contains a negation about reporting ('did not say') not a bare negation about the threat itself.
The segment describes a control measure ('automatically quarantined') which implies control (Q5).
The segment describes control/prevention measures ('additional restrictions', 'continuing to test') which implies preparedness/control (Q5).

The segment advises protective steps ('should take some simple steps to protect their birds') which implies prevention/preparedness (Q5).

The segment describes surveillance and measures to reduce risk ('expanded its wild bird surveillance', 'enhance biosecurity measures and rapidly respond to reduce the risk') which implies preparedness/prevention (Q5).
The segment describes monitoring ('regular testing is taking place to monitor the health of flocks') which implies surveillance/control (Q5).
The segment contains preparedness/vigilance cues ('producers are focused on farm security', 'members remain vigilant and practice all biosecurity protocols') which are handled by Q5.
